 Guiledart looked at Magmatron. "It ios not a device
my leader. Its a chamber. It takes a chamber to make
the complete reprogramming. I will work on it as fast
as I can." Him and Neptune walked into the lab. Dusted
off the old tools and started to work immediatly.
--- t882hcc91@... wrote:
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Then please do that," Magmatron said. He hoped
> to gain some new 
> recruits from this. "Guiledart, get to work on the
> reprogramming 
> device, I want it on my desk tomorrow."
> 
>
